website_summaries.verdict: Not as durable as the other products on this list, but it's a great space saver and a good value for the price.
pros: Ultra-slim design makes it easy to fit into the fridge
cons: May tip over if not stabilized

customer_reviews.title: Great for the fridge
customer_reviews.text: Only had it for less than a week but it works great. I found a great way to fix the vacumn issue without taking the lid off or leaving it loose. I bought some gas can vents, black ones and drilled a 15/32" hole and popped it in. Now all I have to do to pour water is pop the vent, pour and push it back down when I"m done.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slowly leaking seal around spout
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this beverage dispenser, but like a similar model from a different manufacturer, it had a leaky seal around the spout. Water accumulated on the refrigerator shelf and in the bottom of the refrigerator. I wish our well water was reliably safe 100% of the time, but it isn't. I hate buying the 2-gallon water bottles with dispensers at the store, since all you can do is recycle when they're empty, but at least they don't leak.
customer_reviews.author: the68monkey

customer_reviews.title: Fits in fridge easily!
customer_reviews.text: This is super convenient and fits great in our fridge! We have purchased five in total. Two broke - the seam that runs down the bottom can split fairly easily as the plastic is a little ridged but for the cost and ease provided we’ve continued to replace the broken ones. It does need the lid loosened to let air in as you drain the fluid from it but I imagine you’d have this issue with similar products. Haven’t tried another brand so if we have another break might look into it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: then retighten to prevent air from making the liquid go bad. Easier just to use some carafe
customer_reviews.text: Made OK, but too awkward for me to use for iced coffee. Have to unscrew top while in the frig to get liquid to come out, then retighten to prevent air from making the liquid go bad. Easier just to use some carafe, take out, unlock, pour, relock and replace in frig. Good idea, but needs valve or something to make it easier to get liquid out and then reseal without having to reach all the way into the frig.
customer_reviews.author: Louis L.

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t leak.
customer_reviews.text: This was an inch longer than advertised, so it wouldn’t fit. I had to put it on a lower shelf & lay it flat with the nozzle turned sideways. It didn’t leak. But ultimately I had to buy a different one that fit, since the lid needs to be open slightly to prevent a vacuume. Other than the wrong size, the quality was good.
customer_reviews.author: K G

customer_reviews.title: Good quality jug with spigot
customer_reviews.text: Great product (tough plastic, plus the spigot actually works, and doesn't leak), and fits well in the fridge. I have had other similar products before, and this seems of better quality than many on the market. Holds tea, lemonade, milk, water... any beverage that you will want cold. Just be aware that you have to unscrew the cap a little, to keep liquid flowing well. Of course, I didn't expect one, because that's typical for such products. It just means that there's no built-in pressure vent on the cap or anything like that.
customer_reviews.author: K-

customer_reviews.title: Fits fridge well
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had the problem other reviewers have had with leakage. I would expect it to eventually be a problem if I put hot liquid (tea) in and tightened the cap fully, so I leave it loose until cool and then tighten it. It fits a large volume of beverage in my fridge without feeling like it takes up a large volume of space!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Fits in fridge easily. Great handle.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for water, juice, lemonade, tea etc. Easily stores in refrigerator. Easy to use. It holds up to 2 gallons of your favorite beverage. Large top opening to easily add whatever you want. I plan to get a couple more before the summer hits so the kids have drink options ready to go in the fridge. I really like this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits in the frig perfectly and easy to fill .
customer_reviews.text: I had another brand that had it's filling hole in the top middle and it was very hard to fill because the faucet neck on our sink isn't very long thus the spout cracked . This one is closer to the back and works great . All of the plstic is of excellent quality . HIGHLY RECOMMEND it and the seller for a fair price and fast free shipping .
customer_reviews.author: EmptyPockets

customer_reviews.title: Glad I found this - it's perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the size and shape of this pitcher. Two-gallon containers are too big for me, and everything else I've seen would take up too much room in the fridge. This one fits very well to the side leaving plenty of room for other items. I have not experienced any leaking around the nozzle as other posters have, but I, too, have to leave the cap undone for the liquid to flow. I'm not concerned about it falling over and making a mess (I live alone), but I took away a star because maybe there is a better design for the cap.
customer_reviews.author: T2para

customer_reviews.title: No problems
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t have any issues at all with leaking except maybe a single drop from the spout after pouring a drink. It does need some venting though. Drilled a hole in the top cap and inserted a vent for a portable gas can like others have and it worked great
customer_reviews.author: Guy-who-buys-things

customer_reviews.title: Great economical alternative to having big jugs of water delivered without giving up valuable storage space.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with a PUR faucet filter to keep cold filtered water easily accessible in my fridge without giving up too much space for other food items. Not only has this saved me the monthly expense of water delivery (which is ridiculous), I don't have to deal with a bulky water cooler in my kitchen or finding storage space for the bulky water delivery jugs. It's much easier and convenient fill this container up right at my kitchen sink.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley Prentice

customer_reviews.title: you need to do a better job of quality control
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived with no spigot, won’t order again. If company is reading this, you need to do a better job of quality control. Can’t really use the product without the spigot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great water dispenser!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this container. The cap prevents the air from being replaced while the water is being empied out but without the cap the water tastes like fridge (not good) after 2-3 days. I just remove the cap and let the air refill so the water can come out without issues. The design is great; container is slim and of durable material. Probably the best one out there.
customer_reviews.author: MissBordoy

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it's been used
customer_reviews.text: Straight out of the box, product had dirt and ripped off labels/stickers. Looks like it was used. Trash!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Like our water container. Impressed with customer service
customer_reviews.text: This product is great and is narrow. No more needing to move the jug of water out of the way to get to the things behind it. My first container arrived with a hole that appeared to have occurred during shipment. I contacted them and they shipped a new one out the same day. The new one works great!
customer_reviews.author: mimom2one

customer_reviews.title: It works Perfectly if you have any common sense.
customer_reviews.text: This gadget is very well made. The people who complain that it doesn't work right don't have much mechanical aptitude. Loosen the top and it releases the vacuum so it flows easily. Some people are really dumb!
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: well designed
customer_reviews.text: nice product. fits well in fridge and takes very little space so I don't have to take the milk out, then take the kids' juice out to get to the iced tea. The tap is well made and doesn't leak all over my fridge like similar products have in the past. This is really slow to drain unless you leave the screw-on lid super loose to prevent a vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: John Koehler

customer_reviews.title: You will have to leave the cap off the top in order for the water to flow correctly
customer_reviews.text: When The Jug gets at least one third down in volume the water quits flowing. You must take the cap off the top in order for The Jug to get air for the water to flow which, obviously, allows all the refrigerator smells to get inside your water jug. Not happy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Stjo

customer_reviews.title: Solid container but annoying lid
customer_reviews.text: Container works well but the lid doesn't vent so unless you leave the lid unscrewed or punch a whole in it you get a very slow fill to your glass. Solved by putting a hole in the lid.. but it should already be vented. Spout is good quality and doesn't leak so that makes up for the annoying lid.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Great Container!
customer_reviews.text: This container is great because it doesn't leak like some of the others do...and fits easily in my fridge without taking up any extra room.
customer_reviews.author: Dinkus

customer_reviews.title: Fits in my fridge
customer_reviews.text: This dispenser is a perfect size and shape for my fridge. It does a suitable job dispensing water. A hole/vent in the top lid makes the water exit smoother. However, the corners are fragile. This is my second one as I have broken a corner before. Definitely won’t survive a sizable fall. However, I haven’t found anything that fits my fridge better, so I’ll keep going back to it.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: Lousy design when the spout and its lever bumps into the shape of the jug. If it was 1'' outward more, this wouldn't happen, or else reshape the water jug to be more flattened in front.
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: Great space-saving decanter with quirk
customer_reviews.text: We like our water cold, so this really comes in handy. One thing to be aware of is that you have to have the cap all the way off for it to decant properly. We just keep it resting lightly on the mouth of the dispenser.
customer_reviews.author: Prunella

customer_reviews.title: Great jug- hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: What makes this refrigerator jug great-its narrowness- makes it hard to clean, so it is a bit of a trade off. you can use a bottle brush to get most areas inside it clean
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad spigot design
customer_reviews.text: Well it’s sturdy and all but they didn’t think of a way to let air in so the water doesn’t get out unless you poke a small hole on the top of the cap in which it defines the purpose of the water smelling like the refrigerator. They need to figure out a way to let air air through the spigot while filling the glass up, kinda of a water cooler type of thing.
customer_reviews.author: Verified Purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Nice container
customer_reviews.text: I use this to put concentrated coffee in to make iced coffee. Could use for tea, etc...
customer_reviews.author: Melinda W

customer_reviews.title: Love love these
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these.One for my fabric detergent. And one for my fabric softener. I love them .I have RA and these are so easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Gaylan Prator

customer_reviews.title: So far, terrific!
customer_reviews.text: I've had two for a week, and they're working great! I got two so that I'd have one full of cold water while the other is chilling. (Also, 10lbs is easier to manage than 20.) No leaks, cleaning is easy with hot water and soap, easy to add ice. I wish it had a vent but I'm going to add one in the cap (has can vent).
customer_reviews.author: Steph Smart-North

customer_reviews.title: NOT AS PICTURED
customer_reviews.text: The product received is NOT the same as product pictured (see photos). I purchased based on how the product looks and it’s size/dimensions. The product I received looks similar to another product that is offered on Amazon but the reviews are not as good... which is why I didn’t purchase that container. We will see how long this ugly container lasts since the container I received has reviews of it leaking and the boyfriend already loaded it with detergent, so we can’t return it.
customer_reviews.author: LaurenT

customer_reviews.title: Good but cheaper else where
customer_reviews.text: Love that it slides in small area in fridge but it has such a strong suction, I have to take tontop completely off to get anything out of it!! It is half this price at Walmart and less than $4 at Aldi's...and Aldi's come in different colors!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing a key component
customer_reviews.text: I really thought this would be a great product, but unfortunately it didn't come with spout. So it's useless. I'd love to request just the spout from the company, but alas the only choice is to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Nice size, holds plenty of liquid
customer_reviews.text: Fits great in the fridge, simple design, spout easy to clean. I will be buying a glass one (so the plastic doesn't seep into the drinks) in the future, when my younger child gets a little bigger. So far the container being plastic helps ease my mind about the kids helping themselves to our home made juices.
customer_reviews.author: Monika Robinson

customer_reviews.title: I Liked the slim size of it
customer_reviews.text: I Liked the slim size of it, but after about a week it started leaking at the spout.Tightened it up but still leaked. Bought a glass container for fridge instead. wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Over priced, cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: Dispenser is flimsy and spout feels very cheap. I can’t imagine it holding up very long. Plus, there is no pressure release valve, so after filling a couple of glasses, the suction/pressure builds up and pouring slows to a trickle. Overpriced for quality. Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Fogal

customer_reviews.title: This is my new favorite water jug
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite water jug. I bought it because the water machine at work kept going out and I got sick of having to buy water bottles. Now I just fill this up before work and I'm good to go. I like how slim it is and it fills really easily. I get a lot of "oohs" and "aahhhsss" when people see it on my desk. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: I use to buy these at Walmart until they only carried the double size of these. They are fantastic for making gallons of lemonade and Iced tea. I keep two full in my fridge at all times and they're great.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: JUNK
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately after only having this a month it is leaking so I just threw it out.
customer_reviews.author: Camilla B.

customer_reviews.title: Slim, practical
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure about the durability because it’s too soon but it looks well built. It fits perfectly on my fridge and it’s really handy for having cold water. This way I don’t need several bottles of water and because of it slim body, it doesn’t bother at all
customer_reviews.author: martin

customer_reviews.title: Came home to 2 gallons of Ice Tea all over my kitchen floor, twice.
customer_reviews.text: The container is sturdy and takes up a minimal amount of space, but the cheap spigot ruins the product. Leaked everywhere twice so far so will not be using it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Joe J.

customer_reviews.title: Yes it drips
customer_reviews.text: Love the size of this and the idea of having a spigot, but unfortunately the spigot drips.
customer_reviews.author: Brian D. Leister

customer_reviews.text: I need to unscrew the white cap on the top while I pour to release the pressure inside. But all and all it does what i need it to.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew K

customer_reviews.title: Perfect depth for counter-depth refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: Don't you love it when something works?! We have a counter-depth refrigerator and this fits perfectly - just the right amount of depth. It is just under 16" deep including spigot, under 10" high, and 2 3/4" wide. As mentioned by some other buyers, a vacuum is created when the lid is screwed on tight, but my husband drilled a tiny hole in the lid and water flows perfectly! It is very good quality and we are completely satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed because I loved the shape and how it fit ...
customer_reviews.text: It leaked and filled my fridge with ice tea. It was returned and I got my money back. Disappointed because I loved the shape and how it fit in the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits great in the fridge
customer_reviews.text: So-so. Fits great in the fridge, however it has difficulty pouring normally. You have to unscrew the cap and then it will dispense some then stop, then bubble, then repeat. Takes forever.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great space saver
customer_reviews.text: I love these and they save so much space in frig.I use them to hold tea and they can be a little difficult to clean but still worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rened

customer_reviews.title: Great for storing detergent and keeping out of littles’ reach
customer_reviews.text: I use these for my laundry detergent and softener. Based on reviews I did use plumbers tape on the inner spout before use. I didn’t want to take the chance of it leaking.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi from El Paso, Texas

customer_reviews.title: False Advertisement
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item and when it arrived it was missing the dispenser spout, looking at the photos i see it has it, so i reported it and they issued me a return and sent me a second one at no cost, Great! But when I get the 2nd one its the same issue, missing the dispenser spout!? Not a Happy Customer.
customer_reviews.author: Yesenia

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: I like this water dispenser very much; it takes up very little room in my refrigerator, and it's made very well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: That it works and thin
customer_reviews.text: I bought to put my dish detergent in in small space. Everything I used leaked and mess. This is thin Ang works great. Good price and fast coming. Thank u
customer_reviews.author: Midgie

customer_reviews.title: Larger than description
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, but description shows 14.5 inches from back to tip of spout. Actually was 15.75 inches. Size limits to RV refrigerator was purpose of purchase, but too large for door to shut.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery S. Payton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I love how small this is and how it fits in the refrigerator. The handle at the front makes it easy to remove to refill. I was looking for something small for iced tea dispensing. The tea hasn’t stained it in any way either, which I expected it to.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is perfect. Had this for a couple of months and still working fine. Takes up almost no room in the fridge, the pour spout does not drip and works well. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: T. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great Slim fit Refrigerator pitcher
customer_reviews.text: I love this container... It takes up very little space in the fridge... Holds about a gallon and a half... If you take your time putting on the spout... I've never had a leek... I have two... One for Iced Tea and one for Orange Juice... It's Great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Steven C. Goble

customer_reviews.title: Terrible - Leaks all over
customer_reviews.text: this product leaked terribly. It flooded my entire refrigerator. why can't they make one that doesn't leak? I would demand my money back but don't know who to contact.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Bench

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last - seemingly poor welds
customer_reviews.text: less than 6 months before seams started to leak - poor quality
customer_reviews.author: Chuglet

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: This fits what we were looking for. It fits in my fridge while saving space. I have not experienced any leaks besides when I didn't push it in enough and one of my bottles hit the spout. Water flow is better when you don't screw the top on all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Its good for what it is
customer_reviews.text: Even though I read the dimensions and measured I still expected the jug to be more slim. There's not a lot of difference in the size of this and the 2.5 gallon waters you can buy at the grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: FlyToFreedom

customer_reviews.title: Have to leave the cap loose for good flow.
customer_reviews.text: I like this. We have two and they work pretty good. They need an air vent on top otherwise you have to loosen the cap for good flow. They don't take up much space but they hold a bunch.
customer_reviews.author: Crazytom

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Had a bigger one that began to leak. Could have bought a new spout but thought I'd try a smaller size since I live alone. It takes up far less room and while I may have to fill it more often it works really well. I think I'll buy an extra spout, just in case. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: GBD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the job
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, very handy, I use it on my desk so I always have water near by and it's one of the best things I've ever bought myself - very pleased with it! It's nicely made. You have to remember to loosen the cap when you're using it as otherwise you create a vacuum problem. It's not too heavy to carry when it's full and it's easy to pour water out from, although towards the end you need to tip it up. Overall highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Book fans

customer_reviews.title: Leaky
customer_reviews.text: These worked really well first two uses. After use number two the capping at the valves got loose and caused messy leaks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!!
customer_reviews.text: This is was easier to clean then my old square shaped one.
customer_reviews.author: T.Chelle

customer_reviews.title: All ie good
customer_reviews.text: Used all the time very sturdy no after drip from spout
customer_reviews.author: Frank D.

customer_reviews.title: This dispenser is great and we love it
customer_reviews.text: This dispenser is great and we love it. We had no problems with the spout leaking as we read the reviews and made sure it was properly tightened. The narrow width means more space for us in the refrigerator and the beverages cool quicker, too. The only down side is that you do have to loosen the cap or you will have the vacuum buildup slow the dispensing. Also, we mostly use this for Iced Tea and the gallon sized tea bags are a little tricky to get out after the tea has steeped. We'll never be able to go back to the old round jug dispensers, though.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest E. Howe

customer_reviews.title: The dispensers are a perfect fit for the refrigerator.
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes cold tea, and different flavors of Crystal Lite, which take up space in the refrigerator. I bought 3, and they fit side by side in a space that normally one of his gallon plastic containers would occupy. The little flip dispenser is great to pour a glass of tea or any drink you prefer without taking the container out and then putting it back in the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela C. Cartright

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!!
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised, only better! Takes up very little space in the refrigerator, yet holds over a gallon of liquid! No leaking from the spout and easy to fill. Like other reviewers, I loosen the cap on top when the flow slows down - and bingo! No more problem. I'm buying one for my son and his family and I know they will love it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great size!! am using for dispensing laundry soap and fabric softener on front load washer sits on top and no more lifting heavy container and spilling. Wish I had purchased several months ago.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Easy carry handle and slim profile make it a great way to carry and dispense liquids. We bought this to bring our own filtered drinking water with us camping and it really fits that purpose to t T. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: These worked great for my hand washing station. Holds a lot of water. Easy to fill and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: N. C.

customer_reviews.title: Ultra Slimline Pictured
customer_reviews.text: Really like it. Doesn't take up much space, but holds plenty. Only complaint is the lack of a pressure relief valve. You have to unscrew the top, depending on how often you use it.
customer_reviews.author: Shira

customer_reviews.title: Working out good. The only quam I have with it is ...
customer_reviews.text: Working out good. The only quam I have with it is if you decide to add fruit... for example lemon slices...they tend to block the spout and slow down the flow. The plastic parts aren't super heavy duty, but it does the job and stays out of the way in the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Genereaux

customer_reviews.title: Great product but wasn't deighted on how it was more likely to tip over
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't pleased with the stability of this jug. It seemed to be more easily tipped over. Other than that, it is a good product and if you are not worried about it tipping over, this one will be a 5 star for you.
customer_reviews.author: PsychSchematics

customer_reviews.title: Leaks all the time
customer_reviews.text: Spigot leaks all the time! Today was the last straw when red Gatorade was pouring out of my closed fridge onto the floor. I put up with the small drips for too long. Should have thrown it out weeks ago.
customer_reviews.author: Glen Gay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect height. Nice and thin
customer_reviews.text: Perfect height. Nice and thin. It's great, especially in the summer, to not have to refill a small pitcher and wait for it to cool.
customer_reviews.author: Maricela d.

customer_reviews.title: Worth It
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and is as described. Just what I was looking for. Really like it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: No Problems
customer_reviews.text: Unlike other reviewers, I have had no "air lock/vent" problems with the flow even with the cap screwed on tight.
customer_reviews.author: Fox4

customer_reviews.title: Ideal water dispenser.
customer_reviews.text: Product is well made and is perfect for dispensing drinking water. We keep it in the refrigerator. Fits nicely on the shelf and easily clears the door.
customer_reviews.author: Lou J.

customer_reviews.title: Saves so much space
customer_reviews.text: It’s great for when you don’t have too much room in your fridge. It works great even for mojotos with lots of mint. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Lizeth

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly in my refrigerator. The only issue is the need to equilibrate the vacuum that is generated when used. Drilling a small hole through the cap fixed that problem perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: wootsy1

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I keep 2 in my fridge full of water at all times. No leaking, no worries. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Colette R. McCammon

customer_reviews.title: DOES  EVERY  BRAND  OF THESE LEAK FROM THE POUR SPOUT  ?  YES  IT SEEMS SO.....
customer_reviews.text: SPOUT LEAKS AFTER 2 MONTHS OF LIGHT USE -- MY FRIDGE IS NOW MESSY FROM THE DAMN DRIPS My previous unit bought at a local grocery store lasted 24 months or longer - cheap China crap once again -- I would rather pay twice the price for a USA MADE jug that didn't leak the first time I use it....
customer_reviews.author: Wm. D. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Check all corners before using
customer_reviews.text: After filling and using the beverage dispenser, I realized water has been dripping down my fridge. Come to find out, a pin size hole was at the corner of the product and water was slowly spilling out in my fridge. I missed my return window so I was unable to send back the product... don't make the same mistake I did!
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie Harrison

customer_reviews.title: My son has figured out the perfect iced tea recipe
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this beverage container. It answers my need perfectly. My son has figured out the perfect iced tea recipe, i.e. proportion of lime juice, lemon juice, orange juice, tea bags, for this particular container. It fits perfectly on the refrigerator shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Della

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: Good for storing disinfecting solution (dissolving tablets) and dispensing it to refill spray bottles.
customer_reviews.author: RO12

customer_reviews.title: Fits nicely in fridge, but has its flaws
customer_reviews.text: Needed something to keep my water cool without taking up half a shelf in my fridge, and decided to go with this because of the price. It does its job, takes up hardly any space in my fridge and holds a decent amount of water. HOWEVER, it needs some sort of pressure valve, because it's nearly impossible to get water out of it without unscrewing the top to let air in, so we need to remove it from the fridge any time we're pouring water, which is a pain.
